Name: FieldLite Red
Description:
Manufacturer: NV-TAC
Type: Flashlight
Attachment Point: Underbarrel
Size: 1

The FieldLite Red is a tough and tactical underbarrel flashlight. Featuring a corrosion-proof body and impact resistant lens, NV-TAC tested the attachment across a variety of environments and conditions to ensure it works when needed most. This special Red edition projects a red light in the shape of a circle. Ideal for situations when illumination on close range targets is essential without projecting a bright light that could be easily spotted.
